divs: sighting detailsi am not sure what it was and i don't know who to report this to as this is something i have never seen before. i was driving around 5:24 a.m. through the chino\chino hills area westbound on the 60 freeway headed toward the 57 freeway. i looked up and seen flashes of light that appeared orange-ish (like orange sherbet.) the lights were behind a group of clouds. i kept looking up to see if anything was falling, ascending, traveling left or right and i seen nothing. the lights didn't go anywhere. the flshing reminded me of lightning, but the flashes weren't brigh enough to be lightning as it only lit up a small area of the sky behind the clouds, not the entire sky like lighning would. i have witnessed on 2 or 3 occasions near the same area, a light in the sky that made me think it was an airplane, but it just sat still for a long time. then it proceeded to move and take off vey quickly and disappear. so, in short, this is not the first time i witnessed something strange in this area.
Summary: Orange flashing lights in the sky behind a group of clouds for a few seconds
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Chino
There were no other sightings in Chino on or around September 23rd 2011
